overview: Over her 20-year career, Shappi has performed sell-out shows all over the UK and internationally, been nominated for the prestigious British Comedy Award and appeared on every comedy panel from Mock The Week to Have I got News For News. In this hour, Shappi talks about what it means to be addicted to stand-up, to have a very controversial father, and to bring a pudding to a red-carpet event...
title: Shappi Khorsandi: Live In SoHo
